thread.title: BRIEF-Toyota Motor Corp says co has developed taxi dispatch support system

title: BRIEF-Toyota Motor Corp says co has developed taxi dispatch support system
text: March 9, 2018 / 7:32 AM / in 10 minutes BRIEF-Toyota Motor Corp says co has developed taxi dispatch support system Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 9 (Reuters) - Toyota Motor Corp: * TOYOTA MOTOR CORP - CO, JAPANTAXI CO WITH KDDI CORP AND ACCENTURE, HAVE DEVELOPED TAXI DISPATCH SUPPORT SYSTEM THAT PREDICTS DEMAND FOR TAXI SERVICES * TOYOTA MOTOR CORP - THE COMPANIES HAVE STARTED TO DEPLOY THE SYSTEM IN METROPOLITAN TOKYO ON A TRIAL BASIS * TOYOTA MOTOR - SYSTEM USES ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TO PREDICT NUMBER OF OCCUPIED TAXIS IN TOKYO USING 500-METER, MESH-BASED PARAMETERS EVERY 30 MINUTES * TOYOTA MOTOR CORP - THE COMPANIES COLLECT TAXI SERVICE LOG DATA AND DEMOGRAPHIC PREDICTIONS AS WELL AS OTHER FACTORS THAT AFFECT TAXI DEMAND Source text - bit.ly/2DcPPQ4 Further company coverage:
